sentences.en: Both the colour and pattern of this printed silk are very subdued and in good taste.
sentences.cn: 这块绸子的花色很淡雅.

sentences.en: Breakfast was a very subdued affair.
He faced the press, initially, in a somewhat subdued mood.
sentences.cn: 他最初面对媒体时情绪有点忧郁。

sentences.en: He seemed a bit subdued to me.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他当时有点闷闷不乐。

sentences.en: His soothing words subdued her fears.
sentences.cn: 他的安慰话减轻了她的恐惧.

sentences.en: I felt strangely subdued when it was all over.
sentences.cn: 一切都结束的时候,我却有一种奇怪的压抑感.
理查德今晚好像很沉默。

sentences.en: She was dressed in grey and looked suitably subdued.
sentences.cn: 她身穿灰色衣服,看上去颜色柔和,很得体.

sentences.en: Tasteful, subdued lighting sprang up around an elegant interior lounge.
sentences.cn: 格调高雅的柔和灯光立刻流散在一张高雅的长椅四周.

sentences.en: The audience are strangely subdued, clapping politely after each song.
sentences.cn: 观众们出奇地安静，只是在每首歌结束后报以礼貌性的掌声。

sentences.en: The boys were subdued by these solemnities, and talked little.
sentences.cn: 这两男孩子被这些阴森的气氛控制住了, 都不大说话.

sentences.en: The conversation around them was resumed, but in subdued tones.
sentences.cn: 他们周围的人又开始交谈了，但这次是窃窃私语。

sentences.en: The demeanour of the black - uniformed men suddenly became more subdued.
sentences.cn: 穿黑制服的汉子们的态度马上安静下来.

sentences.en: The subdued talk in the room faded down.
sentences.cn: 屋里低声的谈话安静下来了.

sentences.en: They were finally subdued and burried alive under Mount Aetna.
sentences.cn: 后来他们都被打败了并被活埋在埃特纳山下.

words.tran_cn: 减弱的；被制服的；被抑制的
使服从，压制，减弱（subdue 的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 制服的，被抑制的，缓和的，有节制的，抑制，顺从，（人）闷闷不乐的，默不作声的，不感兴趣的
trans.tran_en: subdued lighting, colours etc are less bright than usual

trans.tran_cn: 征服( subdue的过去式 )，克制，制服
